EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Payment Notification for Max Katz (21644) (1343161107.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Payment Notification for Max Katz (21644) (1343161107.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Max, We also received payment $4,625 is for June 18th –July 8th for a total of 92.5 hours (invoices: 384091, 384092, and 384093.) You may not see the notification because it was first applied to the incorrect invoice with the $65 per hour rate. Just wanted to give you a heads up. You know have an account balance of $5,462.50 which is both payments less MBO's 5%. This will go through payroll today and you will be paid (less taxes) on Friday. The projected net pay is as follows:With current information, your next payroll will be on 7/27/2012 with withholding taxes based on 12 pay periods per year as follows:Current Account Balance$5,462.50Encumbered Funds 1 <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=PCPayrollOptions#1> $0.00Insurance Expenses 2 <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=PCPayrollOptions#2>$0.00Business Center Payroll Taxes 3 <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=PCPayrollOptions#3>$761.14Business Center Retirement Match 4 <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=PCPayrollOptions#4>$0.00Gross Pay$4,701.27Personal Payroll Deductions 5 <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=PCPayrollOptions#5>$1,276.42Business Center Expenses$0.00Paycheck Amount$3,424.85Ending Account Balance You will receive a full break down in your account on Friday (once the payroll is processed through ADP.) Thanks!Sara -----Original Message----- From: sconde@mbopartners.com [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] Sent: Tuesday, July 24, 2012 4:06 PM To: max.katz.work@gmail.com; Sara Conde Subject: MBO Partners Payment Notification for Max Katz (21644) We received the following payment(s) today, 07/24/2012 on your behalf: 1,125.00 Fee Calvin Group - Jet Morgan - Invoice: 384094 - Jul 9, 2012 - Jul 15, 2012 Sincerely,The MBO Partners Billing/AR Department
